UntitledCollection.description: Name of new collection if not provided

UntitledBookmark.description: Name of new bookmark if not provided

noticeImport.description: Title of the notification for bookmarks import

noticeImportedFromChrome.description: Message shown when bookmarks are imported from Chrome

confirmBookmarkMultiremove.description: Confirm message shown while trying to remove multiple bookmarks
confirmBookmarkMultiremove.message: 你确定要删除所选择的 $1 个书签吗？

confirmCollectionRemove.description: Confirm message shown while trying to remove a collection
confirmCollectionRemove.message:
你确定要删除以下分组和其中所有的书签吗？

$1

labelResultsOfSearch.description: Label shown instead of the current channel when searching text is not empty

buttonConfirmNewCollection.description: Text for submit button in the new collection form

buttonGoToWebsite.description: Text for button to load the website of extension

buttonImportingFromChrome.description: Text for import-from-Chrome button when the import is in progress

labelLogIn.description: Title of the log in box

placeholderEmail.description: Placeholder of the email input box

placeholderPassword.description: Placeholder of the password input box

buttonForgetPassword.description: Text for button to find password back

greetings.description: Message shown when the user is logged in

buttonShowAllBookmarks.description: Text for button in popup menu to load the bookmark manager page
